channel.title: Design on Hashnopolis
channel.description: Recent content in Design on Hashnopolis

item.title: Design Tic Tac Toe
item.description: Design a Tic-tac-toe game that is played between two players on a n x n grid. You may assume the following rules: 1. A move is guaranteed to be valid and is placed on an empty block. 2. Once a winning condition is reached, no more moves is allowed. 3. A player who succeeds in placing n of their marks in a horizontal, vertical, or diagonal row wins the game.
